entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. Temperature steady near minus 26.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 26. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26 with temperature rising to minus 21 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear except cloudy over southern sections this evening and after midnight with 40 percent chance of light snow. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26 with temperature rising to minus 21 by morning. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High minus 17. POP 40%
